  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x163
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x163
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x147
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x147 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutBlockFlow {CAPTION} at (0,0) size 200x43 [border: (3px solid #FFA500)]
          LayoutText {#text} at (77,3) size 46x37
            text run at (77,3) width 46: "cap"
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,44) size 198x102
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,0) size 198x102

                text run at (1,1) width 92: "foo bar"
                text run at (1,38) width 45: "baz"
